channel.title: CVE Feed for ThemeBoy -- SportsPress – Sports Club & League Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThemeBoy -- SportsPress – Sports Club & League Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-1178|2024-03-05T01:55:47.179Z -- themeboy -- sportspress%20%E2%80%93%20sports%20club%20%26%20league%20manager
item.description: The SportsPress – Sports Club & League Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the settings_save() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.17. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the permalink structure for the clubs

item.title: CVE-2024-34824|2024-06-11T13:29:34.369Z -- themeboy -- sportspress%20%E2%80%93%20sports%20club%20%26%20league%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeBoy SportsPress – Sports Club & League Manager.This issue affects SportsPress – Sports Club & League Manager: from n/a through 2.7.20.
